about.at_the_end_of_2022: In 2023, the team of Domakin came together to address an issue many students like them face during their journey in the Netherlands - finding housing.
about.with_the_aim_to_help: Some of the founders of Domakin had already established a student organization across the country. After speaking to students, agencies, and parents, it became clear that the biggest challenge for international students in the Netherlands remains finding housing. Thus, Domakin was founded with a mission to make this process easier for as many students as possible.
about.it_is_hard_for: As a team who has experienced these challenges first-hand during our studies in the Netherlands, we are here to assist you in finding your new home:
about.if_you_are_located: If you are looking for accommodation in the Netherlands, we are here to help you!
about.if_you_want: If you are currently located abroad and are unable to attend a viewing, we are here to represent you at a viewing!
about.if_you_are_searching: If you are are leaving your room or searching for a flatmate and want to help another student find housing, we offer a platform to list your room!
about.service_2: A platform to search for housing
about.service_3: A platform to list your room or apartment

introduction.part_1: Finding a home in the Netherlands can be challenging, especially for students and expats.
introduction.part_2: At Domakin, we aim to make your search simpler, faster, and more secure.
introduction.part_3: Below is a breakdown of our services designed to support you at every step of the rental process.

viewing_assistance.intro: We understand that attending property viewings in person isn‚Äôt always possible. That‚Äôs why we offer Viewing Assistance Services, allowing you to have a trusted representative from Domakin attend the viewing on your behalf and provide detailed feedback.

standard.title: Standard Viewing Assistance ‚Äì ‚Ç¨{{price}}
standard.description: Schedule a viewing in advance, and one of our agents will attend on your behalf.

same_day.title: Same-Day Viewing Assistance ‚Äì ‚Ç¨{{price}}
same_day.description: For urgent requests, we offer priority scheduling for same-day viewings.

items.1: Full attendance at the property viewing.
items.2: Photos and videos of the property.
items.3: Answers to any questions you may have about the property.

audience.title: Who is this service for?
audience.description: This service is ideal for students, expats, or anyone unable to attend viewings in person. Whether you're abroad, have a busy schedule, or need someone to act on short notice, we‚Äôre here to ensure you don‚Äôt miss out on housing opportunities.

viewing_by_agent.intro: Finding time to arrange property viewings can be challenging. With our Viewing Booked by Our Agent service, we handle the entire scheduling process for you, making your housing search smoother and more efficient.

steps.1: You provide your personal details, rental preferences, and CV.
steps.2: Our agent contacts landlords or property managers on your behalf.
steps.3: We schedule a viewing and provide you with all the necessary details.

items.1: Direct communication with landlords or property managers.
items.2: A scheduled viewing tailored to your preferences.

audience.title: Who is this service for?
audience.description: This service is ideal for busy individuals or those unfamiliar with the Dutch rental market. Whether you're a student, expat, or working professional, we take the hassle out of scheduling viewings so you can focus on finding the perfect home.

renting_room.section_title: üè° Renting a Room Through Our Platform ‚Äì ‚Ç¨{{price}}
renting_room.intro: Looking for a student-friendly room without the stress of endless searches? Our Renting a Room Through Domakin service connects you with verified listings on our platform, providing a secure and reliable way to find accommodation.

steps.1: Browse available rooms on our website.
steps.2: Apply for rooms that meet your preferences.
steps.3: If you sign a rental contract through Domakin, a one-time fee of ‚Ç¨{{price}} applies.

steps2.2: An agent contacts you and starts the searching.

points.1: We work directly with trusted landlords to provide safe, reliable housing options.
points.2: Our listings are verified to minimize the risk of scams.
points.3: Our agents aim to bring options of your preferences straight to you.
points.4: We make it easier to secure accommodation tailored to students and expats.

audience.title: Who is this service for?
audience.description: This service is perfect for students and expats seeking a reliable, hassle-free way to find housing in the Netherlands. By using our platform, you‚Äôll gain access to trusted listings and reduce the risks commonly associated with house hunting.

viewing.let_us_make_the_viewing_for_you: Let us make the viewing for you
viewing.description: You have found a room or an apartment in the Netherlands, but are unable to attend the viewing or you are in the process of searching for accommodation and want to ensure there is someone who can represent you at the viewing?
viewing.service_offer: We offer the service of representing you at a viewing. One of our agents will attend the viewing according to your request. They will take photos and videos and make any inquiries to the landlord. Where possible a live video connection will be made so you can have a more realistic view of the apartment.

emergency_housing.short_stay_description: Find a place for a short stay in one of our trusted properties lent by trusted people. The cost is low (if any) and the stay is limited but can help someone in need. If you need emergency housing in the Netherlands, simply follow the steps:
emergency_housing.step_1: 1) Select a property from the list below
emergency_housing.step_2: 2) Fill out the application form in the listing
emergency_housing.step_3: 3) Wait to be contacted by one of our agents with more details

emergency_housing.offering_place: If you are giving a place for a short time
emergency_housing.lend_extra_bed: Lend an extra bed/coach to someone in need for a short stay. Many people, and more specifically students, come to the Netherlands without a place to live in order not to miss out on their studies. You can significantly help by offering to urgently house a student until they find their accommodation with our help. To list your property, simply follow these steps:
emergency_housing.step_2_offer: 3) Fill your details and the property's in the form that will appear
emergency_housing.step_3_offer: 4) Wait for a response from our side to approve you

members.name: Lazar Popov
members.about_extra: Hello, my name is Lazar. I'm from Ruse, but I have been living in Groningen for five years now. I have a master's degree in Artificial Intelligence. I am familiar with the city and have experience in searching for and finding rental properties. My interests include combat sports and artificial intelligence. Besides being an agent at Domakin.nl, I am also the president and co-founder of the non-profit student organization Bulgarian Society Groningen. I would be happy to assist you!

members.name: Sava Popov
members.about_extra: Hello, I'm Sava and I'm a student in the "Creative Media and Technologies" program in Groningen. I have spent a lot of my summer time before coming to this town in searching for apartments, going on viewings, and asking acquaintances for advice. After numerous unsuccessful attempts, I finally managed to find a place, and I believe I now have a good understanding of the mistakes and successes in apartment hunting. I would be glad to help anyone who is in a similar situation!

members.name: Paolina Gocheva
members.about: Bachelor in Micro and Macro Economics
members.about_extra: Hello, my name is Paolina. I‚Äôm originally from Varna, Bulgaria, and I‚Äôve been living in Rotterdam for nearly three years now. I am currently finishing my studies in Economics and have also taken various business and management courses to strengthen my expertise. I‚Äôm passionate about staying active through sports and enjoy traveling to explore different cultures. Alongside being the Regional Manager for Domakin in Rotterdam, I have held several leadership positions in non-profit student organisations. I‚Äôm familiar with the rental market in Rotterdam and would be delighted to help you find your perfect home!

members.name: Radost Lozanova
members.about_extra: Hello, I am Radost, a graduate from the University of Groningen. I have lived in several countries as a student which involved frequent moving, thus I understand well the difficulties in finding accommodation abroad. As part of Domakin my goal is to help as many students find their cozy home, so they have the comfort to enjoy their student life in the Netherlands. I enjoy all things creative and channel my inspiration and motivation into my work as Design & Marketing Manager at Domakin.

members.name: Vladislav Marinov
members.about_extra: Hello, my name is Vladislav, and I'm a business graduate from London, England. Although in a different country, I am also familiar with the problems a student can encounter when searching for accommodation. Stress, despair, and anger are just a few emotions I have experienced personally while looking for an apartment in London, and I know the difficulties one can face, especially when searching remotely. It is a pleasure for me to work on this platform, which I believe will help many people!

recommendations.team_made_list: The team of Domakin.nl has made this list in order to help anyone with finding or lending properties in all of the Netherlands. Here you can find platforms to help with your searching and you can always count on us for support or extra services! Simply click the name to view the platform.
recommendations.contact_for_help: In case you need more information or any help, please contact us through the contact page or our service page!
recommendations.beware_of_scammers: Be aware of scammers on Facebook. Share documents only with trusted profiles and always require an in-person meeting or video call. If you are in doubt, better call us for help.

privacy_policy_content.introduction: At Domakin, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data while you use our platform to find accommodations in the Netherlands. By accessing and using the Domakin website or mobile application (referred to as the "Platform"), you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_content.information_details:
We may collect various types of information from you, including but not limited to: Personal information: Your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
Profile information: Details about your preferences, interests, and accommodation requirements.
Communication information: Records of correspondence between you and Domakin.
Usage information: Data about your interactions with the Platform, such as search queries, viewed listings, and user interactions. Family and income declarations: Some information about your family, their income, personal income and any other financial information that might be requested from a landlord or a side that requires it for accommodation lending purposes only.
privacy_policy_content.usage_purposes:
We use the collected information for the following purposes: To facilitate your use of the Platform and provide personalized services.
To match you with suitable accommodation listings based on your preferences.
To improve our services, user experience, and customer support.
To communicate with you about your account, listings, and related updates.
To analyze usage patterns and conduct research to enhance our offerings.
privacy_policy_content.sharing_circumstances:
We may share your information in the following circumstances: With accommodation providers: Your profile information may be shared with accommodation owners to facilitate booking and communication.
With third-party service providers: We may engage trusted third parties to assist us in providing services, such as payment processing or data analytics.
Legal compliance: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, or that of others.
privacy_policy_content.your_choices_description: You can control your personal information on our accommodation platform by managing your account settings, including your contact details, marketing preferences, and saved payment methods. We give you the option to opt-out of non-essential communications and delete your account at any time, though we may retain some information for legal or security purposes. You can request a copy of your personal data that we hold, or ask us to correct any inaccurate information by contacting our support team. If you're in certain regions like the EU, you have additional rights including the right to data portability and the right to request that we erase your personal information, subject to legal requirements.
privacy_policy_content.security_measures: We employ industry-standard security measures to safeguard your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
privacy_policy_content.children_policy: The Platform is not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors without parental consent.
privacy_policy_content.cookies_policy: We use cookies to help our accommodation website work better for you. These cookies remember your login details, preferences, and how you use our site, which helps us show you more relevant accommodations and improve our service. Some cookies are essential for the website to work properly, while others help us understand how people use our site or show you personalized ads. By continuing to use our website, you agree to our use of cookies, but you can change your cookie settings in your browser at any time.
privacy_policy_content.contract_policy: For ensuring safety for both sides, we may require you to fill in your details and sign a contract when finances are included. The contract can be stored and used by us for any legal actions that are required if one of the sides fails to comply with what is required by them. Domakin guarantees to provide a copy of the contract to its client and to any other side when a request has been delivered and approved.
privacy_policy_content.contact_us: If you have questions, concerns, or requests related to your privacy

description.property: The room is 8 m¬≤, and you'll be sharing the kitchen and bathroom with three other roommates( two guys and one girl).  All of them are friendly, respectful and quite. They are all towards the end of their bachelor so quite focused on their studies. There's a common balcony, but no shared living room.The apartment is on the second floor of the building, located in Selwerd, just a 10-minute bike ride from both the city center and Zernike campus. Registration is possible!

FOR_RENT.title: Small room in a shared house

description.property: The 12 m2 room has a desk, chair, double bed, drawer, closet, radiator and mirror. There is shared kitchen and bathroom with 5 other tenants. Registration is possible!
description.period: From January 3rd on, for at least half an year

description.property: A free room, available in a new 5-bedroom apartment in Rotterdam. The apartment is well-maintained. Registration is not possible.

Apartment with 4 bedrooms offers a free room. The Apartment is new and well-maintained. The location is great because you are a 5-minute walk to Noord metro station. Registration will be possible, shortly after the room is occupied.

The room is spacious , fully furnished with a long balcony that connects to the kitchen. The tenants are 3 boys ages 20-22 and the shared facilities are the kitchen (sink, cabinets,2 fridges, stove, oven, microwave, and a new washing machine), bathroom, separate toilet (recently renovated). We have a cleaning schedule that is strictly followed. The location is in a great neighborhood next to Noorderplantsoen , it takes 10 minutes by bike to reach Zernike campus and 15 minutes walking to reach the center. supermarket Plus is right around the corner and stores like Albert Heijin, Jumbo, Aldi , Kruidvat and Paddepoel shopping center are 10 minutes walking distance. The boys are very kind and reliable we get along very well as communication , respecting each other, keeping a friendly environment is a priority and sometimes we enjoy a beer together. Registration is NOT possible.
description.period: From 1st of February until 31st of July
description.bills: only internet is not included (13 euro monthly fee)

description.property: The property is fully furnished and equipped, allowing tenants to move in with minimal preparation. üå± Sub-rent period: December 13, 2024, to January 13, 2025 (‚Ç¨850, all-inclusive). üå± The location is highly convenient, with an AH, Vormar, OBA store, and various Turkish shops nearby. üå± Public transport is easily accessible: Tram 13 to Centraal Station stops within 100m of the building, and Bus 369 connects to Sloterdijk station in just 10 minutes. üå± The property is approximately a 30-minute bike ride or 45-minute train ride to the University of Amsterdam campus. üçÄ Lease Transfer: As a tenant is seeking to relocate and has the landlord's approval, there is an opportunity to transfer the lease, with address registration possible.

FOR_RENT.title: 20 m2 room in a shared house

description.property: Cosy room with sun light! Furniture need to be bought from the previous tenant and a deposit of 1 monthly rent is required. Registration is possible!
description.period: From end of December (at least for 1 year)

FOR_RENT.title: 12 m2 room in a shared house

description.property: Enjoy a well-equipped home with convenient amenities, including a laundry area, washing machine, and dishwasher. The property also features two bathrooms, a large terrace, and a garden‚Äîperfect for relaxation and social gatherings. A reliable heating system ensures comfort throughout the seasons. Located in a vibrant neighborhood, you‚Äôll be just moments away from Amsterdam Bijlmer Arena, nearby stations, gyms, supermarkets, and several universities. This room offers a convenient and welcoming living experience with easy access to all the essentials for a balanced lifestyle. Registration is possible!

Spacious room in 2-floor house. The first floor is common and on the second there are the 4 bedrooms. The location is suitable for young people, it is close to shops and bus stops - just 15 mins away from the city center. Registration is possible for minimum period of 1 year.
New furnished apartment with two bedrooms, living room and a separate kitchen. There is also a balcony. We are looking for 2 new tenants to move in. Registration is possible.

FOR_RENT.title: Small room in a shared house

description.property: Basically, the house has 2 floors and a basement. On the 2nd floor there are 3 rooms and a bathroom. On the main floor there's the living room, kitchen, and toilet. And in the basement there's 2 rooms where we keep the washing machine. The offered room is on¬†the¬†2nd¬†floor. New tenants will need to purchase the existing furniture for ‚Ç¨160. Additionally, the new tenant will take over as head tenant, meaning they will be responsible for collecting rent from other housemates. The house is situated in a quiet neighbourhood, just a 3-minute walk from Lidl and 15 minutes from the train station. There‚Äôs also a bus stop right in front of the house. A security deposit of 320 euro is also required. Contract must be at least 1 year.
description.period: From mid December earliest or start of January the latest

description.property: Sunny room in a well-connected area. Looking for a female tenant, preferably a student and vegan/vegetarian. All furniture is included, and registration is possible! No deposit is required for the room.
Studio in the center of the city. Close to all necessary shops and utilities as well as to parks, universities and clubs. Registration is possible!
Cozy room in a spacious apartment. The room that is offered is from the main and second pictures and the furniture can be bought for extra 150 euro. Registration is also possible.
description.period: October 1st 2024 - July 1st 2025 with an option of extending

description.property: Cozy 20 sq. meters room studio apartment with own kitchen and bathroom. Located close to the city centre of Groningen, 4 mins walking from Vismarkt, 8 mins from Groningen train station and 10 mins from the University Library. The building hosts mainly students. Registration can be made for the time of stay

Cozy 15 sq. meters room, close to the city center. The room comes furnished. The house is shared with 3 other Bulgarian roommates. There is 1 kitchen, 1 toilet, 1 bathroom, and a shared room for relaxation. Registration is NOT possible.

The room is 17m2 (furnished). The apartment has everything needed and the furniture remains as shown in the pictures. The room is available for a short term while the owner is on exchange, and registration is NOT possible.

The room is 14m2 (furnished). It is located in the area of Vinkhuizen. The address is Goudlaan 233 (Groningen) and the rent is ‚Ç¨353 all included. The price of the furniture is ‚Ç¨200. The deposit is ‚Ç¨353. The shared facilities of the house are kitchen, bathroom, small toilet and yard. The house has 3 floors and it is for 6 tenants. Registration IS possible

The house-boat is located near the city centre, very close to Cambuur (city stadium where shops of any kind are located). It is 5 minutes to city centre, 5 mins to Cambuur, 5 mins to NHL Stenden by bike. The house-boat has 2 bedrooms, big living room, fully-furnished kitchen (with dishwasher), a bath room, 2 toilets (+ washing machine and dryer. It is around 50-60 m2

A room is available from August 1st in a shared apartment for an indefinite time. The room is spacious, equipped with a queen-sized bed and a TV. It is located a 10-minute walk or a 5-minute bike ride from the city center and has multiple grocery stores nearby. The bus station is a 3-minute walk away. The apartment is shared with only one other person and a clean, responsible roommate is preferred (preferably a girl). The house features two stories, a kitchen, living room, balcony, laundry room, and two bathrooms, situated in a residential area. Registration is possible. The rent is 850 per month.

A fully-furnished studio in Rotterdam South for a short stay. The apartment is located in a fantastic area with several stores only three-minute walk away. Public transport is easily accessible, with bus stop around the corner and the metro Zuidplein only a 5-minute walk away. The studio also includes extras like a washing machine, laundry machine, and personal toilet. Registration is NOT possible.
Room in a shared apartment with 2 girls. Spacious room in a shared apartment with 2 Bulgarian room. There is a shared toilet, shower, kitchen + living room. Registration IS possible
Room in a house in Venlo. The kitchen, bath and toilet are shared with 3 other guys. Registration is possible
The studio is located in the city center. It has its own kitchen and bathroom. The toilet is located on the lower floor and is currently shared with 3 other girls.
